title: Covid-19: Markaz attendees are hiding, says Maharashtra home ministry
content: The Maharashtra home ministry said around 50-60 Markaz attendees are trying to hide and their mobile phones are switched off. The police are trying to locate them across the state. Around 50-60 people who had returned to Maharashtra from Nizamuddin Markaz (Delhi) have switched off their phones an

title: China sold the PPEs it got as a donation from Italy to Italy: Report
Coronavirus: Australian scientists begin tests of potential vaccines
content:
Scientists in Australia have begun testing two potential coronavirus vaccines in "milestone" lab trials.
The vaccines, made by Oxford University and US company Inovio Pharmaceutical, have been cleared for animal testing by the World Health Organization.
